Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: starplum80
Reviews.Content: Phone was delivered very next day.  After opening the box, I inspected the phone and battery.  I was surprised to see that the battery had a pink paper on the end which means WATER DAMAGE!  The phone seemed to be in ok condition.  Tried to charge the phone, but it would not turn on.  I am pretty sure this phone was listed as 'NEW'.  After inspecting it, I came to the conclusion that this phone has been used and the battery was no good.  Sent the whole thing back to the seller.  Will NOT be buying a phone from AMAZON again!  You just can't trust people anymore!  Very disappointing!

Reviews.Title: Avoid at ALL costs...
Reviews.Author: Al "Alex"
Reviews.Content: 1st phone came, wrong phone. Second phone came, minor problems to begin with. When I registered the phone with my company, the phone came up as being a different color than what it is physically, meaning that this phone is likely refurbished, NOT new as was advertised. Now, 2 weeks after activation the phone seems to be about as useful as a paperweight. Definitely use this company if you're looking for a major inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: IF YOU LIVE OUTSIDE USA PLEASE DONT BUY THIS JUNK!
Reviews.Author: Venezolano amazonio
Reviews.Content: PLEASE SAVE YOUR MONEY!!! DONT BUY THIS JUNK. I LIVE IN VENEZUELA AND ONLY GSM WORKS WELL AND THEY DONT PUT SERVICE ON THIS JUNK. THE PHONE CAME IN GOOD CONDITION BUT IT IS USELESS HERE AND I CANT RETURN IT. ALSO NO PAPERS. I FELL CHEATED LIKE A CHILD. IF YOU ARE FROM A FOREING COUNTRY DONT BUY IT. IT WILL BE A USELESS PHONE ONLY FOR CAMERA OR MP3 MUSIC.PLEASE SAVE YOUR MONEY DONT MAKE RICH THIS PEOPLE.

Reviews.Title: nothing is perfect
Reviews.Author: Neils C. Dunn "tigersays"
Reviews.Content: for the price I can't complain, but the screen has some kind of defect causing it to show tiny grains on it thereby making the regular images somewhat difficult to see especially in sun light.  Great in most other ways though ohter smart phones have surpassed it.

Reviews.Title: A good outcome
Reviews.Author: Eric Bennett "Dragon 95"
Reviews.Content: My Blackberry just arrived in the mail 3 days before the expected delivery date! I got free shipping for something that would have arrived at the same time if I selected one day shipping (I ordered on Friday and it came on the next Monday) I ordered it from Just Cellular and did a lot of research on them before purchasing a phone. I read before that some phones stopped working after a given amount of time, and hopefully mine does not follow the trend and I ordered it from a different company than those phones. It came with just the phone, battery and wall charger. The packing was left to be desired considering the contents were just bouncing around in the box. But everything checked out ok. I'm very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Fast and exactly as described
Reviews.Author: CarCar
Reviews.Content: Received item quick and just as described. Not original battery but works perfectly fine. Said phone was a verizon phone but ended up being a Boost Mobile.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Colt45
Reviews.Content: this product is in the exact conditon and the right price, also you shipped right on time, you saved me a lot of time and money thanks riskandrew69

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I ordered one of these from BTO. the first phone did not work but the staff sent me out a new one quickly and I have not had any problems so far..

Reviews.Content: The problem with this phone its that is CDMA and no works with a Sims Card :( Hay que tomarlo en consideración si compras fuera de Estados Unidos.. El Celular no funciona con líneas "chip"...

Reviews.Content: The Blackberry Curve I ordered was supposed to come in black and it came in purple. two months later the phone completely malfunctioned and is now unable to work although I had taken very good care of the phone. I would not recommend getting phones on Amazon.

Reviews.Content: My son selected this phone and has been very pleased with it.  It is impossible to find a cover,but it has been much more durable than it looks.  He also says that it fits in his pocket.

Reviews.Content: THIS COMPANY IS ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE.  SENT ME A PHONE THATBROKE AFTER THE FOURTEEN DAYS OF RETURN POLICY WAS UP,SAID THEY WOULD REPLACE IT, MADE ME DO THE PAPERWORKAND NEVER DID.  THIS COMPANY WILL SWINDLE YOU AND WASTEYOUR TIME WITH PRODUCTS THAT DO NOT WORK!!!!! AVOID ATALL COSTS AMAZON CONSUMERS

The reason for this is because the phone cant work with sim card and i needed a phone that can work with sim card. The merchant sold me the first without mention this in the product details online, and later put it in on the invoice .

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: MC
Reviews.Content: Phone arrive promptly, activated smoothly and worked without issues for a few days. Since then it has been nothing but trouble. The delete key is broken, which seems common with these phones. Sometimes it acts like I'm pressing the enter key, and the enter functions as the delete key. After a bit of typing, the phone will freeze. It also acts possessed; randomly sends emails and opens apps when its just sitting there. I inspected my battery. The water sensitive paper was pink, meaning it had been wet at some point. I hadn't spilled anything on the phone, nor was it the humidity (I live in Montana), so I can only conclude that this phone was refurbished and sold to me as "new". I guess my problem isn't with the phone, but with the seller. Luckily, Amazon is good with returns.

Reviews.Title: PURCHASED FROM AMAZON
Reviews.Author: JACKIE
Reviews.Content: Took the phone to verizon to see what the problem was I was informed that the phonewas damp on the inside then I was informed that They would give me five dollars asa trade-in for the phone and I said no way therefore I have a lemon for a Blackberry.

Reviews.Title: You have to be kidding me
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: When I received my BlackBerry I noticed that the phone was very well scuffed up. The phone case was cracked and was coming off. MY BATTERY WAS A WATER DAMAGED BATTERY AND I WAS FORCED TO BUY A NEW BATTERY BECAUSE MY PHONE DIED WITHIN 1 HOUR OFF THE CHARGER. Buying and using this phone was a waste of money.

Reviews.Content: I had one of these before, and I just had to order this one.  I just love this phone; I am a bit old fashion when it comes to still having the keyboard on the phone.  I would order another one of these any time!!

Other than that the phone works great!

Reviews.Title: photo deceiving
Reviews.Author: C. Valentine
Reviews.Content: Picture showed Sprint Logo on screen of phone.  It is a Verizon Phone, cannot use with Sprint.  Seller wanted $10 for restocking and $4.99 for shipping and handling plus would have to paid shipping to send it back myself . Cheaper for me to keep it and re sell it for less money then to put out over half the cost of the phone to send it back.  That will teach me for not reading all the way to the end.

Reviews.Title: Bad!

Reviews.Content: Its a bad product, the batery is a disaster, I cant used it for more that 2 hours.. Its a waste of money

Reviews.Title: 9 Months: No Issues...
Reviews.Author: Avenged 7 Kat "Kat Blomquist"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this March 31st, 2012, and it's January 4th, 2013, now. I have had no issues with my Blackberry Curve 8530.  The only issue I had was my own fault. I pulled charger too hard out of phone one day, and the metal park fell out and wouldn't fit back in. I've had to charge my battery 2 times a day and rotate from my old Blackberry to my new one, just to get by. Annoying, but that's why I'm on here to buy from this same seller again...as I had no issues with my phone, other than my own fault.

Reviews.Title: My back up phone!
Reviews.Author: kayoe
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, but I also have a Otter box with it and I would recommend always getting a Otter box with smart phones, I have had the phone for over year with no issues and its great to have for a back-up.

Reviews.Content: THIS PRODUCT EVEN AS I HAVE KEPT IN MY COUNTRY VENEZUELA not in use these phones with CDMA WELL SO GRATEFUL PUBLISH THE CHARACTERISTICS OF PRODUCTS TO AVOID SHOPPING confusing and inconveniencing NO BUYERS THANKS

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: TKA
Reviews.Content: I like the phone and the many features.  I only wish the battery would last longer. Regardless, I am still appreciative of the nice phone at a low price.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: great phone...but...
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for 2 years. This is my first smart phone and I was excited to get it. Right off the bat I wasn't very happy with how long it took for the phone to power on. 5 minutes to turn on is rather ridiculous. Between having issues with the battery and the earphone piece I think I've spent more time trying to fix it than i did use it. The last time i used the phone i went to unplug it and the battery was so fried the phone only stayed on for 5 minutes before it died. My Contract was up in a month anyway so I decided to just switch to an old phone I had. But I was very happy to get this phone unfortunately it did not live up to my expectations. Now In less than a week I will be getting the Iphone 4. I just can't believe how disappointed I am with this phone

Reviews.Title: Works as long as the warranty
Reviews.Author: Photomatix
Reviews.Content: I had one. I bought it on March 19 2011. By May of 2012 it was beginning to malfunction. Now it's totally useless. It has so many keyboard faults that are so eratic they have to be software that it's not even funny. I spent $200 on this and it is a brick after just ONE year. I'm getting a flip phone now.

Reviews.Title: blackberry 8530
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: Hola! compre el telefono porque decía lliberado y no fue así, porque resulta que no lo puedo activar. me gustaría que me dieran el código o algo así para activarlo aqui en venezuela y asi podré calificar positivo, de lo contrario no. graciasHello! buy the phone because he said lliberado and did not, because it turns out I can not activate. I wish I had the code to activate it or something here in Venezuela and so I can qualify positive, otherwise not. thanks

Reviews.Title: Can not be used in the world's attention that a bad
Reviews.Author: alaa
Reviews.Content: What is this I am upset does not function in the Middle East ... Can not be used in the world .. Solely in the U.S.Seller did not mention the networks that are working on and to show us the device from the inside

Reviews.Title: Ok phone but won't work unless you have bis
Reviews.Author: The Old Guy
Reviews.Content: This was my 5th Blackberry phone and I really liked some things about it. I am an old retired guy that does not use a cell phone much at all,usually 150 minutes a month. I did want wifi and that is why I bought the phone but it only uses a system called bis. That is a blackberry system that can be added to some cell phone contracts, AT&A; charges $10.00 a month for some of it's plans. That is just so you can use the bis system and get on the wifi. Well I don't use the phone enough to pay at least $60.00 a month so the phone did not work for me. The track pad is a real nice improvment and the phone is a breeze to use. Blackberry is fading fast, almost done from what I have heard. Anyway I traded the phone in on a LG Ally and love it. In my book Blackberrys are for business or users with deep pockets for large plans. I am finally done with Blackberrys.

Reviews.Title: kiba
Reviews.Author: kiba
Reviews.Content: Blackberry Curve 8530 Camera GPS Wifi 3G CDMA ONLY no me ha llegado mi pedido aun y ya esta debitado y facturado

Reviews.Title: Many Disappointments with a few good points
Reviews.Author: M. Gehret "G-Man  Colorado"
Reviews.Content: The Blackberry 8530 (for Virgin Mobile) is a disappointment in many ways, the construction of this particular phone (compared to other blackberry's of past) is poor. Cheaply built, lightweight, buttons feel like long term they will not last. The screen is fair, with spotting in areas and even a dead pixel. The battery life is probably the worst thing to list. There is very short battery life with this phone and recharging is a twice daily situation (with a new battery OEM). The sound is good, when on speaker, it actually emits sound from the top (so that when you place it down it is not muffled), the signal is poor and sporadic. Features provided by Blackberry are good. Tools to personalize are long listed and give you a good variety of personal choice. The overall expectations of this model are poor and I would not recommend this. Other blackberry's I have owned and checked out are high quality and well built, not this.

Reviews.Title: Mr Andrews is amazing
Reviews.Author: Miguel Angel
Reviews.Content: For sure mr Andrews is able to resolve problems five stars for him,i hope the other bussiness be like the first one. im very glad for your help. mr andrews

Page plus Cellular doesn't carry or work with the Blackberry app world, so it's a shame I have a BB with No APPS, like social networks..etc.
